job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Data Connectivity team (Full Stack)
job.description:
Products and Technology
The Data Connectivity team at Tableau manages the connectivity layer, which enables connections to various data sources and the ability to import that data into Tableau. Our team consists of individuals from diverse backgrounds with several years of experience at well-known tech companies.
We follow a lightweight agile process with reduced meetings for scrum/sprint planning so each individual is responsible for managing their workload. Our team is fast-paced and has an incredible work-life balance. We try to ensure that folks take advantage of our unlimited vacation policy.
We are building the next-generation connectivity framework using a modern tech stack and are looking for excellent problem solvers who will thrive in our fast-paced environment.
As a Full Stack Engineer on the Data Connectivity team, you will be leading, building, and owning backend services, connectors, SDK, CLI, and various other components of the new architecture. You will work closely with folks across the organization to deliver high-impact features. You will gain insights into how the connectivity layer works with hundreds of databases and SaaS products.
We strive for a high standard of engineering quality while solving unique scalability challenges and delivering delightful experiences. You will be working on a highly visible product that was a result of a recent hackathon.
Tableau hires company builders; employees are expected to be on the constant lookout for the best talent to bring on board, helping Tableau continue to build one of the best companies in the world.
If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits.
